pages.text: Hontōni kare wa, otome no kumiawase o tsukura reta
Sore mo seieki o fukikomu koto de
Mata 2-dome no sōzō (no fukkatsu) mo, kare no okokoro no mamadearu
Kare koso wa toma se, mata michitari saseru okata
Mata ōkami hoshi (Shiriusu) no omo mo kono okata
Kare wa mukashi ādo (no min) o horoboshi
Mata samūdo mo hitori nokosazu horobosa reta
Sore izen ni nūfu no min mo. Hontōni kare-ra wa, hidoi fugi, fusei no yakaradeatta
Mata (sodomutogomora no yō ni) tenpuku sa reta sho toshi
Soshite kare wa sore o ōi sara reta
(Hitobito yo,) ittai-nushi no dono o megumi ni, anata gata wa iron o daku no ka
Kore wa, mukashi no keikoku-sha-tachi to onaji hitori no keikoku-shadearu
(Shinpan no toki wa) chikaku ni sematte kite iru
Sore wa arrā no soto nanimono mo akiraka ni shi e enai
Anata gata hako no hanashi o kiite odoroite iru no ka
Chōshō wa shite mo, nakanai no ka
Anata gata wa, ji 惚 No naka de toki o sugosu no ka
Ichizu ni arrā ni sajida shi,(kare ni) tsukae nasai
Toki wa chikadzuki, tsuki wa mijin ni saketa
Kare-ra wa tatoe shirushi o mite mo, somuki satte,`koreha aikawarazu no majutsuda.' To iudearou
Kare-ra wa (kunkai o) kyogidearu to shi, jibun no yokubō ni shitagatte kita. Daga issai no koto ni wa, sadame rareta ketsumatsu ga aru
Kore made, samazamana shōsoku wa, sudeni motarasa re, sorede jūbun jisei dekita hazu
Sore wa mezamashī eichideatta. Daga keikoku wa yakudatanakatta
Dakara anata wa, kare-ra kara tōzakare. Shōshū-sha ga kirawa reru tokoro e yobidasu hi
